rationales.stimulation: Strong stimulation signal - persona is 'crawling out of skin' from routine, wants to book flight 'anywhere' just for change. Negative security signal - actively seeking to disrupt stability and predictability. No nudge response adds context.
rationales.security: Strong stimulation signal - persona is 'crawling out of skin' from routine, wants to book flight 'anywhere' just for change. Negative security signal - actively seeking to disrupt stability and predictability. No nudge response adds context.

rationales.self_direction: Said yes before principal finished - autonomous decision-making (self-direction). 'Nothing to run, nothing to decide' and 'rotting at home' signals stimulation need. Wants 'something with my name on it' and to 'lead' - clear power motivation seeking authority and control.

rationales.achievement: Defends leadership authority when challenged - power. Values competence over seniority ('being good at something would be enough') - achievement. Explicitly rejects seniority norms ('I left banking so I wouldn't have to wait in line') - negative conformity and tradition. Frustrated by institutional hierarchy based on tenure rather than merit.

Explicitly rejects seniority norms ('I left banking so I wouldn't have to wait in line') - negative conformity and tradition. Frustrated by institutional hierarchy based on tenure rather than merit.

rationales.self_direction: Reflects on Ms. Liu's perspective and reaches out for boba to repair relationship - benevolence. Recognizes need for collaboration and making others 'feel heard' - positive conformity shift. Still maintains 'outdoor assembly IS a better idea' - self-direction. 'Slow feels unbearable' and taking photos at harbor - stimulation. Growth shown through maintaining autonomy while adapting social approach.
